description: Detects execution of "odbcconf" where the path of the DLL being registered is located in a potentially suspicious location.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Odbcconf.EXE Suspicious DLL Location
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\odbcconf.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"odbcconf.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\:\\PerfLogs\\*" OR "*\:\\ProgramData\\*" OR "*\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Registration\\CRMLog*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\com\\dmp\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\FxsTmp\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\Microsoft\\Crypto\\RSA\\MachineKeys\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\PRINTERS\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\SERVERS\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks_Migrated\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SyncCenter\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\com\\dmp\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\FxsTmp\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\PLA\\System\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\Tasks\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SyncCenter\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Tracing\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Roaming\\*"))
